Package chocAn

Class ReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
chocAn.ReportGenerator
public class ReportGenerator extends Object
Report generator for making member, provider, EFT, and summary reports.
Author:
Justin Saye

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReportGenerator()
    Default constructor, no class variables.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void

    Creates a text file containing all the EFT data.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReportGenerator

      public ReportGenerator()
      Default constructor, no class variables.

  • Method Details

    • runMainAccountingProcedure

      public static void runMainAccountingProcedure()
      Generates reports for all members and providers. Generates summary and EFT reports.

    • createMemberReport

      public static void createMemberReport(Member mem)
      Creates a text file in which all the member information is written to. This includes all Member class variables as well as all services provided to the member, sorted by date provided. The file's name is the member's name followed by the date the file was generated.
      Parameters:
      mem - The Member object for which the method is making a report

    • createProviderReport

      public static void createProviderReport(Provider pro)
      Creates a text file in which all the provider information is written to. This includes all Provider class variables as well as all services provided by the provider, sorted by time received. The file's name is the provider's name followed by the date the file was generated.
      Parameters:
      pro - The Provider object for which the method is making a report

    • printSummaryReport

      public static void printSummaryReport()
      Prints a report consisting of every provider's name, number of consultations, and total of fees charged. The report also contains the total number of providers, number of consultations, and fees charged across the chocAn system.

    • createEFT

      public static void createEFT()
      Creates a text file containing all the EFT data. This contains similar information to the summary report. Each provider's name, number, and total fee are written to the file.
